short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides summarization, translation, and text-to-speech features using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides text summarization, translation, and text-to-speech conversion features using AI technology. The main features are:

• Text summarization
• Multilingual translation
• Text-to-speech conversion

This extension is a service that requires users to issue their own OpenAI API Key and use it for accessing the features.
